mapper.select: select trade_date, acc_id, trade_type, amount, e.name as "registrant_name", b.name as "branch_name" from trade t join employee e on t.registrant_id = e.id join branch b on t.branch_id = b.id where cash_indicator = 'TRUE' and t.registrant_id = #{employeeId} and trade_date = #{businessDate}
SELECT amount FROM TRADE WHERE acc_id = #{accountId} AND trade_date = #{expireDate} AND trade_type = 'CLOSE'

SELECT t.id, t.registrant_id, t.acc_id, t.target_acc_id, t.branch_id, t.trade_date, t.amount, t.balance, t.trade_type, t.status, t.cash_indicator, t.description, t.trade_number, t.registration_date, t.modification_date, t.modifier_id, t.version, acc_customer.name AS customerName, target_customer.name AS targetCustomerName FROM Trade t JOIN Account acc ON t.acc_id = acc.id JOIN Customer acc_customer ON acc.customer_id = acc_customer.id LEFT JOIN Account target_acc ON t.target_acc_id = target_acc.id LEFT JOIN Customer target_customer ON target_acc.customer_id = target_customer.id WHERE t.trade_number = #{tradeNumber}

select t.id, t.target_acc_id, t.status, t.amount, e.name as target_name, description, t.failure_reason from trade t join account a on t.target_acc_id = a.id join employee e on a.registrant_id = e.id where bulk_transfer_id = #{bulkTransferId}
